titleStmt.title: The spectacle of louers here after foloweth a lytell contrauers dyalogue bytwene loue and councell, with many goodly argumentes of good women and bad, very compendyous to all estates, newly compyled by wyllyam walter seruaunt vnto syr Henry Marnaye knyght Chauncelour of the Duchye of Lancastre.
titleStmt.author: Walter, William, fl. 1520.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne by me Wynkyn de worde,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
